title: Katie Holmes looks chic as she parades her on-the-go street style out in NYC
text:
Since splitting from her, ex Jamie Foxx, Katie Holmes has been modeling her enviable street-style wardrobe.

The Dawson's Creek actress looked busy as she ran errands in New York City Tuesday.

The mother-of-one was chic while spotted in a business casual look as she hopped out of a cab.

On-the-go: Katie Holmes looked busy as she ran errands in New York City and was spotted in a business casual look while hopping out of a cab on Tuesday

Katie, 40, paired a medium wash pair of mom jeans with a crisp light brown blazer and a white t-shirt.

The blazer was adorned with large, gold buttons on the pockets and sleeves.

Her feet hit the pavement in a pair of black pointed toe pumps that matched the large black tote bag she was sliding up her arm.

Ready for business: Katie, 40, paired a medium wash pair of mom jeans with a crisp light brown blazer and a white t-shirt

Matching accessories: Her feet hit the pavement in a pair of black pointed toe pumps that matched the large black tote bag she was sliding up her arm

She looked glamorous for the afternoon with her brown locks down in a voluminous hairdo.

The Mad Money actress also donned a bright red lip stick and large, square, dark shades.

Katie split from her longtime beau Foxx in August and has been looking extra fashionable and sexy since.

She has been hitting the town with her daughter Suri, 13, from her marriage to Tom Cruise.

Looking good: She looked glamorous for the afternoon with her brown locks down in a voluminous hairdo

Single life:Katie split from her longtime beau Foxx in August and has been looking extra fashionable and sexy since, posting a leggy snap over the weekend

Along with leading the cashmere bra trend, the notoriously private star has been posting some sizzling snaps on social media.

Over the weekend she posted a sunlit snap that showed off her long legs in a pair of pink pajamas.

Many have raved over Katie's new look, with her designer pal Zac Posen gushing to Entertainment Tonight: 'I'm just digging everything and how Katie Holmes, my dear friend, is looking lately.

'She just is looking super hot, feeling good and making the style pages.'
